attributes.additional_details: There has been an increase of antisocial behaviour and knife crime in recent years which has put a lot of people at risk and just a general annoyance to the public. By bringing back the National Service it will hopefully decrease the amount of criminal behaviour by enforcing a level of discipline and respect for others.
attributes.background: Bring back the two years compulsory military service that can be done after you turn 18 (Can defer your call to finish education / studies) However this time include it for both male and female.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595268
